name: The Metaphor
description:
Submission for Weekly Game Jam - Week 141

Theme: "Good Luck"

The Metaphor is a simple and short plat-former, which teaches you a lesson on "Good Luck".

(This is my first ever Game Jam submission)

Controls:
  • A - Left Movement
  • D - Right Movement
  • W or Space - Jump
  • E - Enter through door

Windows executable works 100% and the other builds may work however, I am unable to test the Linux and MacOS build currently, may be checked before deadline.
